&kt_utils_test.SendNotificationRequest{
  Notification: kt_utils_test.Notification{
    CreatedAt: nil,
    HtmlContent: nil,
    Id: "notif-id",
    Severity: "info",
    Title: "Notif Title",
  },
  Recipients: &kt_utils_test.Recipients{
    ContainerUsers: &kt_utils_test.ContainerUserRecipients{
      ContainerIds: nil,
      Filters: &kt_utils_test.ContainerUserRecipientFilters{
        HasAnyOfRoles: &[]kt_utils_test.RecipientsRole{
          "admin",
          "view",
        },
      },
    },
    UserIdTerms: &[]string{
      "user1",
      "user2",
    },
  },
}
